physical_appearance: The image shows a garment and a belt. The belt is black in colour and it has are two tassels attached to it. The cassock is white in colour and the sleeves are long. There are two buttons at the collar of the cassock. Crease lines can be seen on the cassock.
title_text: Priest's Cassock with black rope belt
